page.title: 11The Arts
page.content:
{ The Festival of Arts}takes place in April and May each year and includes competitive events in 500 classes such as{folk dance, singing and drama. After six weeks the festival ends with a public concert at which the winners perform. Entries for the Arts are exhibited in the{Museum and Art {Gallery.}
{ The Drill Hall}in{Pool Bank Street was converted in 1975. It comprises of a theatre seating 300 used as one of the town's few cinemas, meeting rooms for a wide variety of uses, and a bar. The Centre is used by 32 officiated societies including{Inner {Wheel,}theatre groups and the{Indian {Society.
